documentation.text: @notice Minimum Mpoint tokens required to create a crowd proposal
@notice An event emitted when a crowd proposal is created

@notice An event emitted when a crowd proposal is created

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address payable,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,string memory[] memory,bytes memory[] memory,string memory,address,address) returns (contract CrowdProposal)
function (address,address,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,string memory[] memory,bytes memory[] memory,string memory)

params.mpointStakeAmount_: The minimum amount of Mpoint tokes required for creation of a crowd proposal

params.calldatas: The ordered list of calldata to be passed to each call
params.description: The block at which voting begins: holders must delegate their votes prior to this block
params.signatures: The ordered list of function signatures to be called
params.targets: The ordered list of target addresses for calls to be made
params.values: The ordered list of values (i.e. msg.value) to be passed to the calls to be made

methods.constructor: Construct a proposal factory for crowd proposals

createCrowdProposal(address[],uint256[],.notice: Create a new crowd proposalCall `Mpoint.approve(factory_address, mpointStakeAmount)` before calling this method

mpointStakeAmount().notice: Minimum Mpoint tokens required to create a crowd proposal
